WorkItem.Description:

Comments.Message: You left out a key detail. What character?

I have the same problem. Solanu Lightning's Blade.

Tried loading with both the addon and through battle net

just a follow-up to this issue, when I did Options->Reset All Caches I was able to load from armory.

In fact, there were no items at all when I was loading the rawr page until I reset the cache, now I see all the items in the Upgrades list.
